Reviews.Author: Christie B.
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as a low cost option for our children. Since it doesnt have much on board memory, buying an SD card is a must.  Other than that, I would really recommend this tablet, as we havent had any issues so far.  The size is really nice, too.
Reviews.Title: Great for Kids

ProductInfo.Features:
Kocaso M760S 1.2GHz 4GB 7-inch Capacitive Touchscreen Android Tablet General Features:
Black face, silver backing 7-inch capacitive touch screen display 800 x 480 resolution
Google Android 4.0 OS pre-installed (Ice Cream Sandwich!) 1.2 GHz processor w/560 MHz DSP
4 GB internal flash memory (2 GB for general use) microSDHC card slot
Integrated IEEE 802.11g wireless LAN
ProductInfo.Name: Kocaso M760S 12GHz 4GB 7 Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet Android 40 Ice Cream Sandwich w HDMI Camera More! Silver
